name: Mundane Man Ruins the World
description:
Kevin Just is just an average guy. He's out of high school and in a job that he could move up in. He can be a little oblivious sometimes. Guide yourself through the life of a dude in 2020.

---------------------------------------------------------------

This game runs in the command window, don't panic.

Make sure to just use lowercase letters when responding to yes or no questions.

Make sure to use number keys instead of typing out the number as a word (who does that anyways?)
